name: 林群哲
objective:
本課程包括拉普拉斯轉換、傅立葉級數和傅立葉變換，特殊函數（貝塞爾和勒讓德函數，Sturm-Liouville理論），偏微分方程，向量微積分和複變數。
This course include Laplace Transforms, Fourier series and Fourier Transforms, Special Functions (Bessel and Legendre Functions, Sturm–Liouville Theory), Partial Differential Equations, Vector Calculus and Complex Variables.
